it.polimi.sw2019.controller

Class SingleActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.controller.SingleActionManager

  • public class SingleActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius, lentinip This class handles single actions made by the client and message with type of message SINGLE ACTION, it is connected to the class AtomicActions because calls its methods to change the model
